name: Power Pills Turbo
description:
Increases maximum health.

*Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.*

name: Power Pills Light
description:
Increases maximum health.

*Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.*

name: Power Pills Companion
description:
Increases maximum health of both you and your summons.

*Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.*

name: Med-i'-can
description:
Automatically regenerate health.

*Hello... anyone there? Please get me out of here!!!*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Wraith Stone
description:
Heal additional health by killing critters.

*Life sucks, death even more.*

name: Piggy Bank
description:
Gives 130 Solar.

*This product was brought to you by Zork industries, exploiting Zurians since 2780.*

name: Baby Kuri Mammoth
description:
Reduces the effect of all debuffs.

*"LOOK!!! A FLYING ELEPHANT!"*
step1: Debuffs (Slow, Stun, Snare, Silence, Blind, Amplify Damage): -25%;
step2: Debuffs (Slow, Stun, Snare, Silence, Blind, Amplify Damage): -50%;

name: Spiked Tongue Piercing
description:
Increases damage of tongue snatch.

*Get kinky with this spiky accessoire.*

name: Tongue Stretcher
description:
Increases range of tongue snatch.

*Instructions: Apply sticky tape to tip of tongue, then pull and glue to the back of your head.*

name: Cheese & Garlic Mints
description:
Adds a silencing effect to tongue snatch.

*Reek like a real human.*

name: Steel False Teeth
description:
Adds lifesteal to a successful tongue attack.

*Now you can eat everything, even your car!*

name: Morning Star Piercing
description:
Increases damage of tongue snatch against enemy Awesomenauts.

*Newest in our line of killer jewelry.*

name: Spectacles Magnet
description:
Adds a blinding effect to your tongue snatch.

*I bet they won't see this coming.*

name: Surprise Party Mask
description:
Adds extra damage to the decloaking first slash.

*SURPRISE! Happy stab-you-in-the-neck-day!*

name: Pinot Noir
description:
You will regenerate health when you're cloaked.

*Fruity, but with a horrible metallic aftertaste.*

name: French Baguette
description:
Increases movement speed in stealth when a wounded enemy naut (below 50% health) is near.

*Bread sword fight!!!*

name: Basic AI Chip
description:
Makes your replica dummy walk around.

*It's alive! It's ALIVE!*

name: Extra Battery Pack
description:
Increases health of the replica dummy.

*For those long lonesome nights, when you need a friend.*

name: Blow Up Doll
description:
Makes your replica dummy explode on death.

*It's dead! It's DEAD!*

name: Chainsaw Addon
description:
Increases the damage of slash against enemy Awesomenauts.

*In the French cuisine, you need a good knife.*

name: Sharp Edged Razors
description:
Increases the attack speed of slash.

*Cut any vegetable or fiend in a blink of an eye.*

name: Clover of Honour
description:
Increases the damage of your second hit.

*Awarded to the heroes of the first AI war or whoever has 200 solar.*

name: Backstab Blade
description:
Adds an extra amount of damage when striking the back of a target with slash.

*The backside of the blade is extra sharp.*

name: Hungry Sword
description:
Adds a lifesteal effect to slash.

*Because war is give and take.*

name: Electrifier
description:
Adds a slowing effect to slash.

*Batteries not included.*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Quick'n Cleaner
description:
Increases lifesteal and damage of vacuum bite.

*Got your fine shirt covered in hitpoints? Try Quick 'n Cleaner!*

name: Medical Pump
description:
Adds health to your maximum health for every successful bite. This health is removed upon death.

*Clean up with surgical precision.*
step1: Extra Health per bite: 150; Extra Health Max: +450
step2: Extra Health per bite: 150; Extra Health Max: +900

name: Multi Hose
description:
Your bite will affect additional nearby enemies.

*For robo-maid model 34-Y or models with same amount of arms.*

name: Screamer Engine
description:
Vacuum bite will ensnare enemies.

*WHAT ARE YOU SAYING!?! I CAN'T HEAR YOU!*

name: The Suckanator Power 9000 Cleaner
description:
Increases lifesteal and damage of vacuum bite.

*Free coupon inside for a Nurian ants facial.*

name: Power Converter
description:
Get an additional heal over time whenever you bite an enemy.

*Makes cleaning up a walk in the park.*

name: Thermonuclear Cleaner
description:
Increases damage of explode against enemy Awesomenauts.

*Clean any room in one big swipe!*

name: Titanium Hard Hat
description:
Reduce the damage you inflict upon yourself when using explode.

*Approved Calias mining equipment. Safety first.*

name: Grease Lightning Snail
description:
Slows enemies near you while charging explode.

*WARNING: Do not eat!*

name: Blueprints container
description:
Reduces incoming damage while exploding.

*Where does this part go?*

name: Reactor Cooler
description:
Reduces cooldown time on explode.

*Explosions, so hot right now.*

name: Universal Charger
description:
Reduces the charging time of explode.

*When you look closely at the jar, you will see thousands of little stars and planets.*

name: Fragmenting Shells
description:
Makes missiles do damage in an area.

*Anti bugs, rodents and trucks.*

name: Free Flight Fins
description:
Reduces cooldown on missile shot and increases missile speed.

*Faster deploying, faster destroying.*

name: Missile Barrage
description:
Adds a more powerful missile to your launch string.

*Keep away from children and trigger happy Kremzons.*

name: The Juggernaut "Fat Pete"
description:
Adds a giant missile to your launch string.

*Property of Earth's Liberation Front. Made in 2991*

name: Improved Homing Sensor
description:
Makes your missiles better at following enemies.

*Pow! Right in the kisser.*

name: Salvo Value Pack
description:
Adds a full missile barrage and juggernaut to your launch string.

*WARNING!: Do not aim at eye(s) or face(s).*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Trinamite
description:
Increases the damage of dynamite throw.

*Now without superglue coating, making throwing multiple sticks a lot easier.*

name: Mister TNT
description:
Increases the explosion size of dynamite

*Free black van included.*

name: Rubber Sleeve
description:
Makes your dynamite bounce

*Better shape, better explosive.*

name: Bovinian Postcard
description:
Hitting enemies with your blaster will reduce the cooldown of dynamite.

*"Greetings from the green steppes of of Bovinia!"*

name: Transfusion Grenades
description:
Adds a lifesteal effect to dynamite

*How you like them apples!*

name: Incendiary Bomb
description:
Increases damage over time of dynamite

*The perfect gift for your Kremzon mother-in-law. Sharing is caring*

name: Super Breed 2.0
description:
Makes hyper bull bigger, and push harder.

*Patch notes 2.0
+Improved frame rate
+Polished horns
+Added eye patch.*

name: Cattle Rebooter
description:
Reduces the cooldown on hyper bull.

*Cattle rebooter, boots your cows and bulls.*

name: Ribbit Snail Slime
description:
Makes hyper bull slow enemies

*The slime of this snail is a strong adhesive and a popular ingredient in many cocktails.*

name: Bull Charger
description:
Makes hyper bull explode on death

*Overclocks bull's processor to 1337 ultrahertz for faster processing of leg movement.*

name: Techno Viking Helmet
description:
Makes hyper bull deal damage.

*This helmet is property of chief Red Beard.*

name: Mature Ribbit Snail Slime
description:
Makes hyper bull slow enemies.

*A mature ribbit snail produces one of the strongest adhesives in the galaxy.*

name: Eagle Bullets
description:
Increases damage of shots.

*We love war! Buy more stuff from us - Vladimir Pewchenko, Happy Bullets.*

name: Cheetah Bullets
description:
Increases attack speed of blaster.

*No Zurians were harmed during testing, other than the ones that were.*

name: Missile
description:
Adds a slow-loading homing missile to your blaster, which explodes.

*SPECIAL OFFER: Buy one, get one free!*
step1: Missile Damage: @150; Missile Attack Speed: +25; Homing: @200;

name: Crystal Eagle Bullets
description:
Increases damage of shots.

*Crystals from Luxor moon of Calias. Handcarved by Zurians.*

name: Booming Bullets
description:
Makes bullets and missiles do damage in an area.

*On planet Russia, bullet shoots you. - Vladimir Pewchenko, Happy Bullets.*

name: Another Missile
description:
Adds a slow-loading homing missile to your blaster, which explodes.

*SPECIAL OFFER: Buy one, get one free!*
step1: Missile Damage: @150; Missile Attack Speed: +25; Homing: @200;

name: Rocket Boots

Increases movement speed

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Hydro Splash
description:
Increases damage of splash dash.

name: Ice Cubes
description:
Adds a slowing effect to splash dash.

*Head cool, game cool.*

name: Golden Watch
description:
Reduces cooldown on splash dash.

*Manufactured in the Psy Universe. Clock will run backwards in any other universe.*

name: Hammer Pants
description:
Adds a ground pound ability to splash dash which damages enemy Awesomenauts. Aim at the ground to execute.

*Disclaimer: Pants may or may not contain actual hammer.*

step2: Ground Damage: +240; Ground Stun Duration: 0.5s; Ground Distance Down: 31.1%;

name: Clock Necklace
description:
Reduces cooldown on splash dash.

*Manufactured in the Psy Universe. Clock will run backwards in any other universe.*

name: Hydro Smash
description:
Increases damage of splash dash against enemy Awesomenauts.

*WARNING: Water was used for plutonium cooling. Non-Zurians: DO NOT DRINK!*

name: Boom Box
description:
Increases damage of tornado.

*Antique piece of music apparatus.*

name: Turbo Tape
description:
Increase movement speed during tornado.

*Who thought ancient hiphop music would be popular amongst frogs?*

name: Can't Touch This
description:
You gain a damage absorbing shield during tornado.

*Newest hit from MC Green.*

name: Bio Fuel Cells
description:
Increases the duration of tornado

*WARNING: Close all your noses when opening package. Bovinian seal of quality.*

name: Twister Tweeters
description:
Upon wearing off, the tornado effect will explode and deal damage to all nearby enemies.

*Gives that extra boost for those small amphibious earholes.*

name: Right Back At Ya!
description:
Reflects most enemy projectiles during tornado.

*From the legendary Mud Deep.*

name: Swirling Octopus Cartridges
description:
Increases range of shots.

*Freshly caught from the flying seas on planet Okeanos.*

name: Piranha Cartridges
description:
Increases damage of shots.

*May contain traces of human flesh.*

name: Mutant Worms
description:
Increases attack speed of shots.

*Straight out of the pond (swamp planet Ribbit IV).*

name: Viridian Eel Cartridges
description:
Your shots will pierce through enemies, hitting additional enemies in their path.

*Handle with care, use rubber gloves or Zurians.*

name: Mutant Worms: Limited Ninja Edition
description:
The next shot deals extra damage after hitting an enemy with Splash Dash or Tornado. Effect lasts for 5 seconds.

*Ingredients: 7+7% Mutant Worm, 25% Minigun, 3% Bandana.*

name: Thorn Fish
description:
Adds two smaller bullets to your shot. Each bullet does 2 damage.

*WARNING: Do not threaten the thornfish.*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Power Briefs
description:
Adds damage to mighty throw.  

*You feel very powerful in these briefs.*

name: Cortexiphan Shake
description:
Adds a slowing effect to mighty throw.

*Sideffect: You might experience switching between multiple dimensions. *

name: Axethrowing Throphy
description:
Throw further

name: Crankin' Dumbbells
description:
Reduces the cooldown on mighty throw.

*Speed up your weightlifting. *

name: Homeless Gnome
description:
Throw an exploding gnome.

*If you are willing to throw a gnome you can throw anything*

name: Oily Spray On Bronze
description:
Receive an attackspeed bonus after a successful throw

*Real bronze, don't inhale! For robotics only.*

name: Electric Hammer
description:
Adds a snaring effect to Earthquake.

*Knock, knock! Who's there?*

name: Stolen Couch
description:
Increases the range of Earthquake.

*Perfect for powerlifting.*

name: Stone Twins
description:
Makes Earthquake to go to the back as well.

*Twice the action, twice the result.*

name: Iridium Bricks Game
description:
Increases damage of Earthquake.

*Stack 'em high! Ages 350 to 500*

name: Enhanced Muscle Fibers
description:
Recues cooldown time of Earthquake.

*Exercise is so 3008.*

name: Small Volcano
description:
Increases height of Earthquake.

*Fully functional volcano for at the office.*

name: Perfumed White Flowers
description:
Regain health by landing the 3rd Bash combo bit.

*You might get lucky with these.*

name: Flaming Fists
description:
Increases the range of the 3rd Bash combo hit.

*I'm on fiya!!*

name: Chunk of Salted Meat
description:
Increases the damage of Bash.

*Ingredients: 91% Drogo meat, 6% long hairs, 3% salt.*

name: Rubber Ducky Choker
description:
Adds a stun effect to the 3rd Bash combo hit.

*Choke hard to relieve stress.*

name: Fistbump
description:
Deflect bullets with Bash.

*Come at me bro!*

name: Pale Mead
description:
Increases the damage of Bash.

*Goes great with some dried meat.*

name: League Seven Boots
description:
Increases movement speed. Plus an extra boost when throwing enemies.

*When you are in a hurry to get to league 1!*
step1: Movement: +0.8; Throw Movement: +3.2; Throw Movement Duration: +2.1s;

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Drone Army
description:
Increases the amount of drones you can create.

*Self-aware and ready for extermination.*

name: Dark Matter Shots
description:
Makes suicide drones blind enemies.

*Manufactured on AI station 404.*

name: Weapon Clip-on
description:
Increases the damage of your drones' shots.

*Universal fit: easy to attach, even without hands.*

name: Hyper Drive
description:
Increases attack speed of drones.

*From 0 to 100 in 435.5 zeptoseconds.*

name: Weaponised Hull
description:
Improves drone explosion upon destruction.

*Manufactured on AI station 404.*

name: Warpgate Overdrive
description:
Reduces cooldown time on drone gateway.

*Is that a drone gateway in your robe or are you just happy to see me.*

name: Energy Drink
description:
Increases the health and longevity of Healbot.

*Keep your clone brain healthy and alive... for a while.*

name: Overheal Potion
description:
Increases the healing power of the Healbot.

*Chug! Chug! Chug!*

name: Turret Add-on
description:
Enables your Healbot to shoot at nearby enemies.

*Desperate diseases call for desperate remedies.*

name: Hydraulic Sugar Dispenser
description:
Reduces cooldown of Healbot

*Sweet for your friends, sour for your enemies.*

name: Cortex Tank
description:
Healbot will knock away enemies.

*Smack that droid up.*

name: Bombshell
description:
Healbot will leave a mine.

*This bomb brings all the boys to the graveyard.
- Alvin Megabit, owner of Pods industries.*

name: Happy Thoughts
description:
Increases the max healing power of your techno synaptic wave.

*I see rainbows, so pretty... Wait, is that a unicorn?!*

name: Psychokinetic Repulsion
description:
Increases the attack speed of your techno synaptic wave.

*Prescription: while in cleaning mode, pour 2 cups of powder into braincontainer and mix with program 2B twice a day.*

name: Psychothrust
description:
Increases range of techno synaptic wave.

*Open up your mind and unleash your true potential!*

name: Chilli Flavoured Eye Drops
description:
When not firing techno synaptic wave for 3s your next techno synaptic wave will increase in effectiveness.

*Your favorite burning flavor is back and twice as painful! *
step1: Charged Heal: x5; Charged Damage: x4; Charged Heal Over Time: x3; Charge Duration: 2s;

name: Twisted Nightmares
description:
Increases the damage of techno synaptic wave.

*Ahhhhhhh!!!!!*

name: Euphoric Thoughts
description:
Adds a heal over time effect to techno synaptic wave.

*Double rainbow... all the way!*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Aggressive Acid
description:
Goo will burn through glass platforms and drip down.

*It has acid for drool, and is generally unpleasant.*

name: Tentacle Soup
description:
Adds a slowing effect to spit.

*Do not use as hairgel!*

name: Overcharged Metabolism
description:
Enemies directly hit by the spit will receive extra damage.

*Buuuuuuuuuuuuurp ...*

name: Spike Slime
description:
Deal more damage with spitted goo.

*Don't eat the purple snow!*

name: Feather Ball
description:
Increases weedling healing on spit.

*Make this chicken fly!*

name: Split Spit
description:
Spitted goo will split in two new spits when run over by friendlies and enemies.

*Can also be used as silverware polish!*

name: Corrosive Spores
description:
Increases damage of weedlings.

*Flower power overwhelming!*

name: Wild Growth
description:
Increases the damage of placing weedlings.

*A good garden always has weeds.*

name: Fertilizer
description:
Increases weedling life time when fertilized by acid spit.

*The poo from space-hippos is quite potent.*

name: Overgrowth
description:
Weedlings require less parts to build.

*Y u no look so good.*

name: Flex Neck
description:
Increases attack speed of weedlings.

*Also adds happy colourful berries!*

name: Bag of Seeds
description:
Increases damage of weedlings when fertilized by acid spit.

*Just add battery acid!*

name: Rotten Teeth
description:
Increases the damage over time of bite.

*Never brush your teeth again.*

name: Chattering Teeth
description:
Increases the attack speed of bite

*Recommended by professional nailbiters.*

name: Filed Teeth
description:
Adds a lifestealing effect to bite.

*Get the Hollywood smile!*

name: Dental Braces
description:
Deals the damage over time faster, over a shorter amount of time on bite.

*Stay away from electromagnets!*

name: Rabbit Teeth
description:
Get a speed bonus for biting enemies.

*What's up doc?*

name: Diamond Teeth
description:
Increase damage of bite.

*Diamonds are a Skroggle's best friend!*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Solar Krab Burgers
description:
Solar coins will heal you.

*This popular underwater fast food, makes your stomach resistant to solar.*

name: Titanium Spikes
description:
Increases the damage of mines.

*Arm your mines to the teeth.*

name: Toaster Timer
description:
Increases the longevity of mines.

*We like our enemies extra crispy.*

name: Aerial Spring
description:
Makes mines bounce up and down.

*a.k.a. The Dove Exterminator*

name: Mine Constructor
description:
Reduces cooldown time on mines.

*By warping the mines directly from our factory to you, we can provide the quickest recharge time.*

name: Carpet Bombs
description:
Increases the amount of mines placed, dividing total damage evenly across them.

*Instructions: Cut mine along dotted line (use the included steelcutter). Remove the three cores.*

name: Uranium Spikes
description:
Increases the damage of mines.

*My spikes are bigger than yours.*

name: Chrono Rift
description:
Increases slowing effect of time warp.

*Contains huge wormhole. Keep away from children.*

name: Regeneration Pod
description:
Allied droids and Awesomenauts inside your time warp are healed over time.

*Want to feel 20 years younger? Now you can! With our patented Turn-back-time technology.*

name: Pod Pack Deluxe with Banana
description:
Adds a lifesteal effect to your laser while time warp is active.

*Because you are not worth it.*

name: Flash Forward
description:
Allied robots and Awesomenauts inside your time warp will move and fight faster.

*Ends combat and shoetalk with your centipede girlfriend quicker.*

name: Spacetime Continuity Device
description:
Provides debuff immunity during the time warp.

*Special moments will last forever. Literally.*

name: Time Primer
description:
Increases slowing effect of time warp.

*By folding time, we have managed to copy our products many, many times.*

name: Giant Monocle
description:
Increases the range of laser.

*Standard giant bifocal monocle for a giant toad.*

name: Instant Charge Battery
description:
Increases attack speed of laser.

*Charged at lightning farm Xeo-3011 on Sorona.*

name: Resonance Amplifier
description:
Increases the maximum damage per hit of laser.

*Luxor crystals are huge, light, and trendy! A real show stealer!*

name: Flyswatter
description:
Increases the damage per hit of laser.

*Splat!*

name: Hubble's Lens
description:
Increases the maximum damage per hit of laser.

*Although the lens is quite old, it remains perfectly poilished.*

name: Baby Yeti
description:
Adds a slowing effect to your Laser. Starts strong, grows weaker.

*Aw... he is so cute!! OUCH! He bit me! Why you little...*

name: Solar Krab Burgers
description:
Solar coins will heal you

*This popular underwater fast food, makes your stomach resistant to solar.*

description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Antique Machinegun
description:
Increases range of spike dive.

*This rusty weapon has quite the recoil.*

name: Dead Seahorse Head
description:
Shoot extra spikes before you dive. The extra spikes deal 40% of the regular damage.

*The Omean give these to their children to warn them of the dangers of the seas.*
step1: Extra Spike: Yes; Extra Spike Damage: +20%
step2: Extra Spike: Yes; Extra Spike Damage: +40%

name: Alien Abduction Kit
description:
Adds a lifesteal effect to spike dive.

*It's probing time!*

name: Bag Full of Gold Fish
description:
Deal extra damage with the dive when you have 150 solar in your pockets.

*Common currency on Okeanos.*

name: Chrome File
description:
Increases damage of spike dive.

*For male pufferfish hygenic use and escaping prison.*

name: Rigged Casino Games
description:
Allows a second spike dived to be used shortly after the first one, but reduces the damage.

*Nobody likes chance!*

name: Red Bandana
description:
Adds a silencing effect to smoke screen.

*Say what again! I dare ya! I double dare ya!*

name: Clown's Mask
description:
When using smoke screen you will become temporarily immune to all debuffs.

*Worn by Grint tribe members during sacrificial rituals.*

name: Mammoth Sock with Holes
description:
Makes teammates invisible.

*Common giant second-hand sock worn by the mammoths on the glass planet Kuri.*

name: Withered President Mask
description:
Increases movement speed after using smoke cloud.
 
*Although the mask is bleached by the sun, it's still in good shape. It says "4 more years!"*

name: Rocketeer
description:
Increases size and duration of smoke cloud.
 
*This poor guy seems to be tied to a rocket!*

name: Rubber Mask
description:
Get solar for every enemy in the cloud.
 
*Latest in Cerean eyewear. By Lucci*

name: Sharky & Remora
description:
Increases range of bubble gun.
 
*Two friends in a can.*

name: Scarfish
description:
Increases attack speed of bubble gun.
 
*Say hello to my little friend!*

name: Yakoiza
description:
Increases damage of bubble gun after using smoke screen or spike dive.
 
*This decoy was used in the famous Kullinan Koi heist.*

name: Al Carper
description:
Increases damage of bubble gun.
 
*Great with a good cocktail!*

name: The Codfather
description:
Increases damage of bubble gun when a wealthy enemy is near (150 solar).
 
*SALE! Now for an offer you can't refuse!*

name: Loanshark
description:
Receive extra solar for every Awesomenaut kill.
 
*Better pay your debts!*

name: Solar Krab Burgers
description:
Solar coins will heal you.
 
*This popular underwater fast food, makes your stomach resistant to solar.*

name: Butterfly Nebula Dust
description:
Adds a slowing effect to cocoon.
 
*The sacred glowing dust is only available to monks who have completed the trial of the deep sleep.*

name: The Last Pieridae Transformae
description:
Makes cocooned sawblade droids polymorph into friendly humming droids.
 
*This rare butterfly has been hunted to almost extinction for its transforming capabilities.*
step1: Droid: Hummingbird; Droid health: 400; Droid damage: 70; Droid movement: 7.2;

name: Jagra Eggs
description:
Adds a lifestealing effect to cocoon.
 
*Jagra worms dwell on the fungus moon Pulvan. They can produce over 10.000 eggs a day. A delicacy under catterpillars.*

name: Misfortune Cookie
description:
Makes cocoon reduce the health of the target.
 
*This batch of flawed fortune cookies, contains offensive and vulgar language.*

name: Prefab Cocoons
description:
Lets the cocoon explode violently at the end, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
 
*Easy to use folding cocoon for canopy camping.*

name: Moon Nectar
description:
Makes cocooned enemies drop healing nectar.
 
*Highly addictive substance also known as "nectar of the gods". Prohibited in many starsystems.*
step1: Nectar Cooldown: 0.5s; Nectar Health: 50; Nectar Health Multiplier: 2;

name: Hidden Leaves
description:
Increases damage absorption of monarch blessing.
 
*"Popae 1:23 Staring into the vastness of space the great papillon realized that it was not him looking at the universe, it was the universe looking at him."*

name: Gettin' Out of Da Hood
description:
Adds an effect to monarch blessing that increases the speed of teammates.
 
*It's signed by Froggy G. himself!*

name: The Cat Pillar
description:
Adds a healing effect to monarch blessing.
 
*New edition: Carmen covered in moonnectar tell us her deepest secrets.*

name: Bronco Yeast
description:
Reduce incoming damage by an additional flat amount.
 
*Free popcorn car inside!*

name: Kremzon Calendar
description:
Reduces the cooldown of monarch blessing.
 
*This ancient cyclus calendar has an end date of March 2013.*

name: Spiritual Cooking
description:
Monarch blessing will increase max health of teammates.
 
*Nutricious almost vegan recipes for very hungry caterpillars.*

name: Storm Drum
description:
Adds a storm effect to butterfly shot.
 
*Beat that drum like it owes you money!*
step1: Storm Damage: +20; Storm Attack Speed: 200; Storm Cooldown: 4.8s; Storm Duration: 2s
step2: Storm Damage: +40; Storm Attack Speed: 200; Storm Cooldown: 4.8s; Storm Duration: 2s

name: Plastic Praying Beads
description:
Increases damage of butterfly shot.
 
*Universal multi-religion praying beads.*

name: Glow Bracelets
description:
Increases attack speed of butterfly shot.
 
*Rave all night long!*

name: Caterpillar King Statue
description:
Makes butterfly shot heal allied Awesomenauts.
 
*Small statue of Julnas the hungry.*

name: Space-Hippo Manure Incense
description:
Adds a damage over time effect to butterfly shot.
 
*Burns slowly not advisable to species with nostrils.*

name: Wool Shawl
description:
Increases the range of butterfly shot.
 
*Keeps your throat and silk glands nice and warm.*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Voltage Amplifier
description:
Increases the damage of ball lightning against enemy Awesomenauts.
 
*like being hit by Thor himself.*

name: Gyroscopic Dynamo
description:
Reduces cooldown time on ball lightning.
 
*Turns you on!*

name: Thunder Striker
description:
Increases the knockback effect of ball lightning and adds a short stun.
 
*You've been... thunderstruck!*

name: Conducting Gel
description:
Increases the range of ball lightning.
 
*Greased lightning!*

name: Flashing Lights
description:
Adds a blinding effect to ball lightning.
 
*Also works great with picture recording devices.*

name: Heavenly Fire
description:
Adds a blaze effect to ball lightning.
 
*A storm is coming.*

name: Silver Coating
description:
Increases movement speed during blaze.
 
*One coat only, withstands the four elements.*

name: Chuck's Board
description:
Increases damage of blaze.
 
*With this, you can surf through land!*

name: Disruptor
description:
Increases slowing effect of blaze.
 
*For smooth surfing on rough seas.*

name: Time Travel Turbine
description:
Increases time blaze stays on the floor.
 
*The board is modified to reach a speed of 88.*

name: Syphon Disruptor
description:
Increases slowing effect of blaze.
 
*Far out dude!*

name: Wave Raiser
description:
Leave a longer blaze trail.
 
*Turns calm water into a tsunami, wicked!*

name: Static Gloves
description:
Increases damage of Shock attack.
 
*Yes. Bigger IS better!*

name: Flexible Heat Sinks
description:
Increases the attack speed of Shock attack.
 
*A combination of thermo infatuation and superconductive aerobics should keep the temperature stable.*

name: Wetsuit
description:
Adds a slowing effect to Shock attack.
 
*WARNING: does not protect against actual water.*

name: Power Gloves
description:
Increases damage of Shock attack against structures.
 
*Dominating video play leagues since 2368*

name: Hoover Hands
description:
Adds a lifesteal effect to Shock attack.
 
*Hard rubbing no longer necessary.*

name: Super Conductor
description:
Adds homing electricity particles to Shock attack.
 
*They'll never know what zapped 'em!*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Fresh Scrubs
description:
Reduces the cooldown of evil eye. 

*Nuclear steamed to remove any alien bits and blood.*

name: Toothbrush Shank
description:
Increases damage of evil eye.

*Game rules: 1.) Form a circle with your cellmates 2.) Spin the 
toothbrush in the middle 3.) Whoever the toothbrush points at, stab that
 person! Have fun!*

name: Fake Family Pictures
description:
Reduces the amount of missing health needed per evil eye stage.

*For those depressing dark moments when you need a family smile.*

name: Biter Mask
description:
Increases the slow effect of evil eye.

*Good against braineaters.*

name: Jail Food
description:
Adds a damage over time effect to evil eye.

*Today's deal 50% off! (best before August 3251)*

name: Dummy Prisoner
description:
Increases the range of evil eye.

*ATTENTION! When bought, the vending machine will warn the authorities that you might be planning an escape!*

name: Angry Drawings
description:
Increases damage of rage.

*Don't look.. or it takes you!*

name: Rip-apart Bear
description:
Reduces inflicted upon yourself when using rage.

*So cute! You want to kill him!*

name: Neon Jumping Rope
description:
Increases the size of rage.

*Increase you skills, up to lightspeed.*

name: Blue Three-wheeler
description:
Increases your movement speed while enraged.

*Here's Danny!*

name: Rubberband Ball
description:
Ayla will leave a blood trail which she can pick up after rage has ended, healing her.

*Bounce right back into action!*
step1: Heal: +20; Trail lifetime: 5s; Trail spawn speed: 200;
step2: Heal: +40; Trail lifetime: 5s; Trail spawn speed: 200;

name: Fiery Jawbreakers
description:
When enabling rage after using evil eye you will pull enemies towards you.

*New flavors: Nitroglycerine and gasoline!*

name: Thief Tools
description:
Increases attack speed of chain whack.

*Opens many locks as well as canned food.*

name: Hungry Zurian
description:
Add lifesteal effect to chain whack.

*Zurians are a tough species, their hunger for metals makes them perfect for junkyard work.*

name: Explosive Neckband
description:
Increases damage of chain whack.

*Let things escalate quickly!*

name: Prison Guard Keys
description:
Increases the max hitpoints after killing an opponent.

*Stealthly stolen from a Kremzon prison guard.*

name: Ion Blowtorch
description:
Increases damage of chain whack when wounded heroes with less than 40% are near.

*Crème brûlée anyone?*

name: Sonic Listening Device
description:
Mark critters to let them drop more health.

*Can you hear the Solar bubble?*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Solar Krab Burgers
description:
Solar coins will heal you.

*This popular underwater fast food, makes your stomach resistant to solar.*

name: Flying Fish Compass
description:
Reduces the cooldown of anchor hook.

*In the winter they point south, in the summer they point north, easy!*

name: Blue Heart Medal
description:
Increases the damage of anchor hook.

*Draw me like one of your French girls. :3*

name: Mobile Periscope
description:
Increases the range of anchor hook.

*Penguins on iceplanet Rill use these to find flying fish.*

name: Treasure Lottery Map
description:
Enables a debuff immunity shield when hitting an enemy Awesomenauts with anchor hook.

*Do you have what it takes to find the treasure? This months treasure jackpot is 1.4 million Solar!*

name: Kraken Statue
description:
Increases the stun duration of anchor hook.

*Resembles Kewlu the ancient one, ruler of the flying seas on Okeanos.*

name: Ancient Octant
description:
Makes anchor hook do damage in an area.

*The must have hipster item in sea warfare.*

name: Bovinian Skimmed Milk
description:
Enemies caught by the chain will receive extra damage.

*Can also be used as car paint.*

name: Palladium Teabag Chain
description:
Increases the duration of the chain.

*No more rusty tea!*

name: Alien Sweetener
description:
Increases the health of Homboldt.

*That just kicks it up a little bit!*

name: Pneumatic Spoon
description:
When the chain breaks the caught enemy will receive extra damage.

*Creates a little hurricane in your cup!*

name: Magnetic Anchor
description:
Adds a damage over time effect to drop anchor.

*Clean the sea of mines and spiky objects!*

name: Double Glazed Royal Porcelain
description:
Reduces the length of the chain.

*"Property of the Bouquet residence."*

name: Aquarium Pump
description:
Increases the attack speed of anchor swing and ink spray.

*For deepsea fish tanks.*
step1: Anchor Attack speed: +15%; Ink Attack speed: +15%;
step2: Anchor Attack speed: +30%; Ink Attack speed: +30%;

name: Energized Hook
description:
Increases the damage of anchor swing and ink spray.

*Makes your fish swing!*

name: Krill Biscuits
description:
Increases movement speed when not holding Homboldt.

*Twist, lick and puke!*

name: Not Seeweed
description:
Adds a blinding effect to ink spray.

*It isn't.*

name: Royal Toy Castle
description:
You gain a damage-reducing shield when not holding Homboldt.

*Resembles the sunken castle Windsor.*

name: Pool Boy
description:
Doubles the damage of the next anchor swing and ink spray when switching between weapons.

*Comes with denim cut-off shorts.*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Stealthy Ninja Weapons
description:
Adds damage over time to airstrike.

*User Rating: 0 out of 5 stars "These are glow in the dark?!!... how on Jupiter is this stealthy... I don't even..."*

name: Wheelbarrow with Ammo
description:
Increases damage of the airstrike against enemy Awesomenauts.

*New technology to reload walking mechs. It's not very effective, but looks really cool!*

name: I-Don't-Carebear
description:
Adds a stunning effect to airstrike.

*Look kids! It's gloomy! The super depressed bear from the I-don't-carebears television series!*

name: Double RPG
description:
Allows a second airstrike to be fired shortly after the first one.

*This little piggy blew up the market
This little piggy wrecked home
This little piggy made some roast beef.*
step1: Damage: -150; Cooldown after first shot: 1s; Health: -33.33%;

name: Hamburger Phone
description:
After the airstrike, a healthpack supply will drop.

*"Hello. Yes this is hotdog."*

name: Adlez Princess Phonenumber
description:
Airstrike will go through terrain, all across the level.

*After getting in trouble, Adlez princesses send out intergalactic distress calls to find their prince.*

name: Armpit Shaving Cream
description:
You gain a damage reducing shield when stim pack is enabled.

*Also goes great with some toast and sparkling wine.*

name: Ammo Weekly
description:
Increases the attackspeed while stimpack is active.

*This week's special Recycling bullets: bad for you, good for the environment!*

name: Personal Assistant
description:
Increases the duration of stimpack.

*Pocketsize, they don't need a charger and come with a great résumé!*

name: Angel Wing Toilet Paper
description:
Stimpack automatically reloads your shotgun.

*My $#! feels like heaven!*

name: Sniper Toothbrush
description:
Increases movement speed while stimpack is active 

*If you are going to pull the trigger while brushing your teeth, you're gonna have a bad time.*

name: Grénaide pour Homme
description:
Adds a stun pulse to activating stimpack. 

*A fragrance made of Zurian tears.*

name: Ted McPain Unicorn Dance Karting
description:
Adds a grenade to shotgun shots. 

*Now with a rearview mirror on the controller!*

name: Commando Ted Figurine
description:
Increases the damage of shotgun and machine gun. 

*Wind him up and he will teach your kids the latest barfighting moves.*

name: Teddy's Puffed Spider Eggs
description:
Increases the shotgun ammo.

*Add some chunky Bovinian milk to start the day like a champ!*

name: Tedris Ville
description:
Adds a snipe shot to machine gun when switching weapons.

*Tap two blocks and wait a month or pay 99 Solar cents. Your friends play it!*

name: Can O'Juice!
description:
Increases the range of machine gun.

*Ted juice walk it out! DRAAANK!*

name: Ted's Power Briefs
description:
Increases knockback on shotgun shots.

*Limited Edition! You might want to wash these first.*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*

name: Starstorm Statue
description:
Increases all damage you deal.

*Made out of scraps and offerings, it reads "SHIVA KAMINI SOMA KANDARKRAM*

name: Electric Bike Lock
description:
Increases the Damage of Pounce.

*Returned by the Sunny-daisy school*

name: Zurian Mechanic
description:
Gain 1 charge when hitting an enemy with Pounce.

*"Have you tried turning it off and on again?.. is the button glowing?.. well you need to turn it on then."*

name: Photovoltaic Lightning Charger
description:
Reduces the cooldown of Pounce.

*Only one charge allowed! The superDRM selfdestructs the charger after unplugging.*

name: Big Bang Horn
description:
Increases the stun duration of Pounce.

*SO LOUD YOU CAN HEAR IT IN SPACE!*


*You can't actually hear it in space.*

name: Voltatile Wheels
description:
Increases the distance travelled by Pounce.

*How to have fun:
1) Light the wheels
2) Drive and watch it all burn!

Remember:
Don't do this at home kids!..
Do it at your neighbours!

name: Stunut Helmet
description:
Increases the knockback of Pounce.

*Original helmet with signature of Voltron himself, most badass stuntman in the universe!*

name: Scout Binoculars
description:
Increases the range of energy pulse.

*SPECTATOR MODE!!!*

name: Death Lens
description:
After landing an energy pulse, your next claw attack becomes ranged and deals increases damage.

*Warning! Too much energy through the dark side will destroy planets!*
step1: Next Claw Damage: +125; Next Claw Range: 13.6;
step2: Next Claw Damage: +250; Next Claw Range: 13.6;

name: Bug Jars
description:
Increases the damage per charge of energy pulse.

*Gotta catch 'em all!*

name: Sentient Rock
description:
Adds a silencing effect to energy pulse, that increases per charge.

*These depressed and coldhearted creatures are found in deserts on Sorona.*

name: Chicken in Lunchbox
description:
Increases the amplified damage of energy pulse.

*Please don't eat me! I have a family!*

name: Heartshaped Net
description:
Resets the cooldown of energy pulse whenever you spend only 1 charge on energy pulse.

*Disclaimer: Doesn't actually catch hearts.. Ba-dum-tss!*

name: The Nine Tails Badge
description:
Increases your movement speed, based on the amount of active charges you have.

*Move so fast it's like you are in multiple places at the same time.*

name: Cookie Monster Badge
description:
Increases the damage of your claw per active charge.

*You, cookie showing and me, hunger growing!
So share it maybe?!*

name: Spiderbird Collector Badge
description:
While at 4 or more charges your claw attack becomes a ranged attack.

*To become an Akele Scout, the Fox Troopers need to gather a bag full of hard to catch Spiderbirds.*

name: Living Treasure Map Badge
description:
Increases the attack speed of claw attack.

*Awarded to Scouts who can find the treasure by solving the riddles it speaks.*

name: Herring Snack Badge
description:
Instantly heal yourself for each charge whenever you spend charges.

*Mastered the impossible cookie recipe trial!*

name: Grey Man Group Badge
description:
Increases the maximum amount of charges to 5.

*These musical creatures play the flute well! But you have bested them in a flute-down!*

name: Foxy Boots
description:
Increases walk speed, enables a quadruple jump.

*For chicks with drive who don't take no jive!*

name: Starstorm Statue
description:
Increases all damage you deal.

*Made out of scraps and offerings, it reads "SHIVA KAMINI SOMA KANDARKRAM*

name: Microfilm
description:
Increases the damage reduction of black hole sun.

*Review from Cinemabeasts: 
"This movie is way too short... 1/5 stars"*

name: Cyanide Cigarettes
description:
Increases the damage return of black hole sun. 

"Popular Zurian Candy".

name: Hacking Satellite
description:
Reduces the cooldown of black hole sun.

*"This old satellite was part of the starstorm recon forces."*

name: Bug Detector
description:
Increases the gravitational pull of black hole sun.

*"This Zurian zoologist is able to identify many alien creatures."*

name: Night Vision Spywatch
description:
Increases movement while black hole sun is charging.

*"Press the button to watch the time in the dark!"*

name: Disguise Moustache
description:
Increases the flat damage of black hole sun.

*"Made from real chameleon moustache hairs."*

name: Yellow King Pages
description:
Incrases the damage when teleporting to the beacon.

*"Monsters:
Cookie.........Milkyway
Solar..............Ribbit
Spagetti.........Carcosa"*

name: Circuits Of Time
description:
Leave a decoy behind when teleporting to the beacon. The decoy will explode when enemies get near.

*"For an excellent adventure!"*

name: Glass Case Of Emotion
description:
Makes the beacon go into stealth after placement.

*"Just let it all out!"*

name: Ejection Seat
description:
Adds a heal over time when teleporting to the beacon.

*"When your landlord calls for the rent."*

name: Interrogation Answering Machine
description:
After teleporting to the beacon you will receive an attack speed boost.

*"WHY ARE YOU CALLING?! WHO DO YOU WORK FOR?! LEAVE A MESSAGE!"*

name: Ringtones For The Deaf
description:
Adds a silencing pulse when exiting the beacon.

*"Listen to the most beautiful silent ringtones."*

name: Not So Serious Tank
description:
Increases the damage of photon mines.

*"It has a dolphin on the back..."*

name: Tactical Vest
description:
Adds a lifestealing effect to photon mines.

*"Room for all your tools, oil and Zurian mechanics."*

name: Camouflage Tent
description:
Increases the lifetime of photon mines.

*"Specifically designed for the surface of the sun."*

name: Dog Tags
description:
Increases the attack speed of photon mine launcher.

*"They look cool but they are useless, you are a dispensable warbot..."*

name: Drive-Over Skulls
description:
Increases the explosion range of photon mines.

*"Now with extra crunchy sounds"*

name: Counter Intelligence Cross
description:
Photon mines will start to home on enemies over a short distance after time out.

*"Awarded to the most non-intelligent bots in the field."*
step1: Detonate: Yes; Homing: Yes; Detonation Range: 6.4;

name: Starstorm Statue
description:
Increases all damage you deal.

*Made out of scraps and offerings, it reads "SHIVA KAMINI SOMA KANDARKRAM*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Steeldrum
description:
Increases the damage of saw blade.

*Old Namala steeldrum. One of the few things the Mon'Grah kept from their homeplanet.*

name: Scruffy Towel
description:
Adds a lifestealing effect to saw blade.

*It says "Wash at 42 degrees celcius"*

name: Air Freshener
description:
Adds homing particles to saw blade when rotating in place.

*The fresh smell of burnt weedling fills your cabine.*
step1: Particles Damage Multiplier: +2; Particles Damage: 20; Particles Attack Speed: 75; Particles Range: 6; Particles Homing: 900;
step2: Particles Damage Multiplier: +4; Particles Damage: 20; Particles Attack Speed: 75; Particles Range: 6; Particles Homing: 900;
step3: Particles Damage Multiplier: +6; Particles Damage: 20; Particles Attack Speed: 75; Particles Range: 6; Particles Homing: 900;

name: Suitcase Monster
description:
Increases the size of saw blade.

*These beasts can hold your luggage, but make sure to remove the luggage before they devour it!*

name: Spare Blade
description:
Adds a second saw blade that moves backwards and deals less damage.

*Industrial blades for cutting minerals on the moons of Okeanos.*
step1: Second Blade: Yes; Second Blade Damage: 50%;

name: Alien Hula Girl
description:
Adds a slowing effect to saw blade.

*These vermin live in space trucks. Really hard to get rid of.*

name: Mask Of Fear
description:
Increases your damage while being near the totem of power.

*When the tech-crazy Mon'Grah were exiled from Okeanos, they turned to dark magic wearing these sinister masks.*

name: Book Of Medicine
description:
Reduces the cooldown of the totem of power.

*Contains hundreds of ancient recipes for mystic potions and elixirs.*

name: Ornamented Pipe
description:
Increases height of totem of power.

*Handcrafted from sandworm tailbone this piece is quite remarkable.*

name: Closed Coffin
description:
Increases the health of the totem of power.

*This coffin is nailed shut. You can hear a faint mumble from within.*

name: Voodoo Doll
description:
Adds a slowing effect to the totem of power.

*This new Awesomenauts line allows you to torture your favorite 'naut!*
step1: Slowing power: +15%; Slow duration: +1s; Slow range: 4;
step2: Slowing power: +30%; Slow duration: +2s; Slow range: 4;

name: Trial Elixir Of Knowledge
description:
Adds a knockback pulse when totem of power is created.

*"Failed attempt #30024: Not enough water of Okeanos...? Needs more testing"*

name: Magic Sunballs
description:
Increases the amount of targets your lightning can hit.

*Powered with an electrical current, these fascinating things emit a beatiful light.*

name: Lashes Of The Goddess
description:
Increases the damage of lightning rod.

*Special painted birds bring these lashes down from the heavens.*

name: Pills For The Mind
description:
Adds a slowing effect to lightning rod.

*Warning! Some species experience vivd hallucinations by eating these.*

name: Ceremonial Mask
description:
Allows lightning to hit the same target multiple times.

*Allows the wearer to directly look at welding rituals.*

name: Device Of The Heavens
description:
Increases the attack speed of lightning rod.

*Very old and practical tool used in the creation of holy shrines.*

name: Soul Connectors
description:
Adds damage over time to lightning rod.

*Weird folded strings of metal, possibly for tuning in with astral signals.*
step1: Damage over time: +40; Damage duration: 3s; Fork damage over time: +20; Fork damage duration: 3s;
step2: Damage over time: +80; Damage duration: 3s; Fork damage over time: +40; Fork damage duration: 3s;

name: Starstorm Statue
description:
Increases all damage you deal.

*Made out of scraps and offerings, it reads "SHIVA KAMINI SOMA KANDARKRAM*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Fruity Sprinkles
description:
Increases the snare duration of the frozen hammer.

*These little fruity bugs come in all kinds of flavors.*

name: Brutally Whipped Cream
description:
Increases the damage of the frozen hammer.

*Whipped mercilessly by over angry Kremzons.*

name: Twister Lance
description:
Increases the range of the frozen hammer.

*Never bring a popsicle to a gunfight.*

name: Ice Cream Van Music
description:
Reduces the cooldown of frozen hammer.

*Best tracks of 3586, including "Bananasplit beats by the wizard formally known as Merlin" and "Counting sprinkles by the Kings of Freon"*

name: Snow Shovel
description:
Gives the frozen hammer a healing effect for each target hit.

*Every Gelato boy receives one of these from his father when coming of age.*

name: Yellow Snow Cone
description:
Increases your movement when you hit a target with frozen hammer.

*Don't worry it's lemon flavor... SIKE!*

name: Milk Of Righteousness
description:
Increases the heal of the binding of justice.

*Crafted by holy Bovinian priests.*

name: Banner Of The Triple Scoop
description:
Adds dmage to the binding of justice while it is active.

*The house of the triple scoop is  the biggest Gelati clan, their motto: "One scoop for the king, one for justice and one pistachio!"*

name: Idol Of The Ice Queen
description:
Increases the end damage of the binding of justice against enemy Awesomenauts.

*Although the queen never leaves her frozen throne, she invokes the hearts of the Gelati with bravery and heroism.*

name: The Penguin Throne
description:
Increases the damage of sword strike while binding of justice is charging.

*Made out of 199 frozen penguins, who surrendered in the frozen yoghurt wars.*

name: Penguin Squire
description:
Adds a heal over time to the binding of justice.

*Some of the penguins on Rill defected to the Gelati and managed to become loyal servants.*

name: The Holy Cup
description:
Adds a damage over time cleansing effect to binding of justice.

*This cup is only to be used for stracciatella ince cream.*

name: Chain Mail Tunic
description:
Increases the attack speed of your sword strike.

*Light as a feather... like heavy steel airplane wings.*

name: Royal Sword In The Cream
description:
Increases your slash damage.

*The knight who manages to pull the sword out of the cream will be... EXECUTED. That's the king's sword! YOU PEASANT!*

name: Spoonman
description:
Increases the damage of all abilities when allied Awesomenauts are near.

*These creatures grow spoons from their head. The males often fight and break their spoon. The spoonless males will be made fun of, obviously.*

name: Double Licker Sword
description:
Increases the damage and lifesteal of Cleave.

*You can break the sword in two little tasty swords... aah brainfreeze!*

name: Halberd Of Justice
description:
When an enemy dies you heal a percentage of your health.

*Slap your enemies in the face, with this long arm of the law.*

name: Titanium Coneshield
description:
When your health is below 70% you deal more damage with sword strike.

*We'll eat our icecreams in the shade!*

name: Barrier Magazine
description:
Provides a damage absorbing shield.

*Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.*

name: Blue & Orange Berries
description:
When exiting the orb of Omicron you gain max frenzy.

*These berries are great for making cake and will make it taste unrealistically good!*

name: Wormhole
description:
Increases the range of the orb of Omicron.

*Note from management: This wormhole is not for interstellar travel! Don't be stupid or you will lose your head!*

name: Eye of Coba
description:
Increases the damage of orb of Omicron.

*When gazing into the eye you see the wrath of the Coba sisterhood burning within.*

name: Beryl Scale Cloak
description:
When exiting orb of Omicron you pull enemies towards you.

*Made from Omicron dragon scale, this cloak keeps you nice and warm.*

name: Mobile Analytic Laboratory Zurian
description:
Remove the cooldown of orb of Omicron when you activate orb of Omicron but don't teleport.

*Trained to scout new wormholes and other spacebridges.*

name: Lion Tail
description:
Slows the enemies you hit with orb of Omicron.

*The tail got cut off when the lion tried to move through a wardrobe portal.*

name: Eternal Flame
description:
Adds damage over time to fire breath.

*Lasts forever*
*In Omega time it will last for about 53 min and needs to be connected to a power outlet.*

name: Autographed Picture of Voran
description:
Increases the damage of fire breath on enemy Awesomenauts.

*Voran the only dragon male is super hot!*

name: Chocolate Monster Egg
description:
Grants a damage reducing shield when using fire breath.

*Warning! Don't eat the chocolate outer layer, it is disgusting! There is a delicious mini monster inside! Bon appetite!*

name: Dragon Wing Prosthetic
description:
Increases the range of fire breath.

*Must be used with a proper dragon pilot.*

name: Sunscreen Mouthwash
description:
Increases the duration of Fire Breath.

*Protection up to 1600 degrees, now with Whitening!*

name: Darkenstone
description:
If you have max stacks of frenzy, you deal bonus damage.

*These soul draining stones can be found in black meteorites and are crafted into jewels by Zurian slaves because they don't have souls.*

name: Dragon Speaker Idol
description:
Increases the attack speed increase on dragon frenzy.

*Crafted from a pyroclastic rock of the Darkhorn volcano on Uroth.*

name: Demonic Animal Necklace
description:
Reduces the cooldown of orb of Omicron and fire breath when used at 4 stacks of frenzy.

*Contains the soul of the bottlenose dolphin, a vile and evil beast.*

name: Special Offer Skrogchu
description:
Increases the duration of dragon frenzy.

*This skroggle infested creature can be offered to your god of choice.*

name: Skull Dundun's
description:
Increases the damage of dragon frenzy.

*Drum made from authentic grey man skulls, for nice round sounds!*

name: Misery Tarot Cards
description:
Increases Nibbs health regen while at max frenzy.

*Example card #04: The Friendzoner.
Interpretation: You are close to your goal but you will not reach it.*

name: Chilas Wax Candle
description:
Adds a stun to dragon frenzy when you have no stacks of frenzy.

*Juvenile Suraani cubs use these to practice their firebreathing skills.*

name: Red Sneakers
description:
Nibbs gains extra movement speed and leaves a trail of flames.

*Don't follow the yellow road!*
step1: Movement: +0.8; Damage over time: +115; Damage duration: 2s;

name: Starstorm Statue
description:
Increases all damage you deal.

*Made out of scraps and offerings it reads "SHIVA"*

name: Classics
description:
Increases the damage of Precision Shot.

*Can't beat a classic!*

name: Magnetic Police Light
description:
Increases the speed of Precision Shot.

*This police light runs on bio fuel cells and sticks to any spacecraft!*

name: Birdseed Donuts
description:
Increases the drawing speed of Precision Shot.

*These donuts are spiked with superfood killi seeds!*

name: Nicotine Patches
description:
Every successful hit with Precision Shot will reduce its cooldown.

*With nicotine from the nightshade farms on Kapral within the omicron.*

name: Sticky Cops Moustache
description:
Increases the speed of Rapid Arrows when hitting an enemy Awesomenaut with a Precision Shot.

*If you can't grow one, you buy one!*

name: Badge and Gun
description:
Makes Precision Shot explode on impact and deal damage in an area.

*Welcome back to the force!*

name: Little Johnny
description:
Adds a stun effect to your fully charged Precision Shot after flying for a short distance while Vengeance is on.

*Better be careful, that toothpick looks sharp!*

name: Endless Quiver
description:
Increases the duration of Vengeance when hitting enemies with Rapid Arrows.

*Warning! Only stores holo arrows infinity, other objects are destroyed in this hyperspace container.*

name: Vulpe Bow String
description:
Increases the slowing effect of Rapid Arrows while Vengeance is on.

*Harvesting the valuable fur of Vulpes is a dangerous undertaking. The rare material is often found on the blackmarket for extortionate prices.*
step1: Slowing Power Rapid Arrows: +4%; Slowing Power Precise Shot: +7%;
step2: Slowing Power Rapid Arrows: +8%; Slowing Power Precise Shot: +14%;
step3: Slowing Power Rapid Arrows: +12%; Slowing Power Precise Shot: +21%;

name: Quickdraw Bow
description:
Adds 1 homing arrow to your rapid arrows that will seek out enemy Awesomenauts.

*Shoot faster than your own shadow.*

name: Mirakuru
description:
Increases health regen when vengeance is on.

*This mix of Pulvan herbs is believed to be a muscle enhancer.*

name: Assassin Flags
description:
When Vengeance is on for 6s, your movement is increased.

*These flags are normally hidden to be found by murderers as a nice mix of activities.*

name: Cockfight Spurs
description:
Increases the damage of Rapid Arrows.

*EVIDENCE for case #417 A: This illegal weapon should not leave the evidence locker!*

name: Chicken Grill
description:
Adds an additional arrow to your Rapid Arrows.

*"Chicks dig a brown tan!" - Gustavo Pollos the famous actor of the tv show "Breaking Eggs".*

name: Rocketpack
description:
Increases the range of Rapid Arrows.

*Covered in penguin blood, this is probably a relic from the Frozen Yoghurt War.*

name: Cutlet Frills Ghilly Suit
description:
When there are no enemies near you, all arrows will deal more damage.

*Stay hidden and delicious!*

name: SWCA Coin
description:
Rapid Arrows will split after hitting enemies.

*This coin represents 5 years of membership of Shiny Weapons Hoarders Anonymous!*

name: Defused Hawk Bomb
description:
Rapid Arrows will now reduce the cooldown of Precision Shot.

*"This prop bomb was used in the best movie ever made." - Mr. Heathside*

name: Space Air Max
description:
Increases movement speed.

*Fashionable and Fast.*
